title: Sei
description:
Sei - meaning calm. 
 
 Japandi, natural wood tone, cream sheer curtains. 
 
 This curtain is lightweight and breathable, allowing soft natural light to filter through while maintaining privacy. Its versatile design makes it ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, and dining areas.

title: Kiri
description:
Kiri - meaning fog/mist. 
 
 Minimalist, Plain Colour, Cat-Scratch-Resistant, White Sheer Curtains. 
 
 Our sheer curtain is lightweight and breathable, allowing soft natural light to filter through while maintaining privacy. Its versatile design makes it ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, and dining areas. Pair it with blockout or room-darkening curtains for added light control and style.

title: Himari
description:
Himari - meaning sunlight and warmth, symbolising soft sunlit diffusion.

 Our sheer curtain is lightweight and breathable, allowing soft natural light to filter through while maintaining privacy. Its versatile design makes it ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, and dining areas. Pair it with blockout or room-darkening curtains for added light control and style.
